title: Fireworks display permits
dataVerified: Pyrotechnician name, license, event location, safety plan, insurance, fire dept
dataVisibleAfterVerification: Shows the issuer domain and the responder text (e.g., "Valid ID" or "Denied").
rationale: Prevents fake fireworks permits. Domain binding verifies fire marshal. Licensed pyrotechnician verification. High liability risk. Prevents illegal fireworks displays. Public safety critical.
